revision.comment: replace {{es-verb form of}} conjugation(s) for infinitive [[yermar]] with 'yermar'
revision.text: ==Spanish== ===Verb=== {{head|es|verb form}} # {{es-verb form of|yermar}} ---- ==Whitesands== ===Noun=== {{head|tnp|noun}} # [[man]] ===References=== * Jeremy Hammond, ''[https://web.archive.org/web/20181026161847/https://core.ac.uk/download/pdf/41233969.pdf#page=68 The Grammar of Nouns and Verbs in Whitesands, an Oceanic Language of Southern Vanuatu]'' (2009), p. 68
